attributes.review: I had downloaded this app in hopping to make America great again. However, like my rights this app has held me Repressed to the knowledge of this country’s state of urgency. All new is fake news. Which makes this app fake and daddy trump don’t like dat fake news. This app is horrible it’s trash 10/10 would not recommend.
attributes.title: This app is just trash

attributes.review: so my cousin told me how terrible his app was so i decided to try for myself. makes me want to kill myself. i can’t believe i ever downloaded this. it’s so awful it makes me want to throw my phone off a cliff. even looking at this makes me want to throw MYSELF off a cliff. please don’t download this. it’s not worth ANYTHING.
attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever had

attributes.review: Well to begin, downloaded the app and it took at least 48 hours JUST to download. Opened the app once it was downloaded and it gave my phone a virus and I ended up having to buy a whole new phone 😡. All I wished to do was support our country’s greatest leader yet he and the app maker let me down 😭😭
attributes.title: Had high hopes

attributes.review: I entered my phone number in at the beginning like it said and now I’m receiving inappropriate pictures and slurs??? I can’t believe it, this app should not EXIST. Pretty sure it has a virus too cause now my phone is overheating and restarts every HOUR and it didn’t happen until I downloaded this app. Please for the love of all things holy DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP ITS DISGUSTING

attributes.review: Bruh I had a dream with wonho from monsta x and we kissed 😌and hugged I ENJOYED THE KISS and I woke up 5 secs after and I was shooketh anyways the ATEEZ comeback got me crazy also I’m in love with I.M idk why but I just love him. For the ATEEZ comeback I think it maybe hongjoong because of all the clues but it might be wooyoung I don’t know how to explain it through here but yeah wonho left the group and I’m blaming it on Donald Trump.
attributes.title: Stan bts

attributes.review: I downloaded this because I wanted to see what it was j by it as soon as I loaded in I saw the ugliest creature I had ever seen and that greatly traumatized me I never thought oranges could be that ugly just pls don’t download this app if you get grossed out easily. I will be going to therapy soon to get that image out of my head. biden2020 BLM
attributes.title: Worst app in the store 🤮💩🤡

attributes.review: Thank you for making this app! It’s Great to actually have a platform that’s not fake news, Thank you!
attributes.title: Best app!!!

attributes.review: It gave me too many ads to the point where it froze my phone! Once I got it fixed, it gave me viruses with its links! The links sent me to some inappropriate pictures and videos, then my phone crashed. I do not recommend this app to anyone, especially to minors!
attributes.title: This app ruined my phone!

attributes.review: first and foremost the app took several days to install. Soon after i opened the app it gave me 4 viruses. It gave out my information to other people who use this app aswell and failed to update or inform me about any rallies or updates on our beloved president. 1/10 worst app on the market possibly
attributes.title: horrible horrible app

attributes.review: This app is very bad, I’m very unsatisfied and veryyyy mad😡when I opened the app trump appeared and out of no where he started to roast me😔he said very hurtful and disrespectful things so then I defended my self and started to roast him supper badly I said “HE HAS NO LIPS HOW HE GET A KISS KISS VERY UGLY 🤮NO KISS FOR HIM  HAHAHAHA” 👿after I was done roasting him the app glitched and it was hard to delete just because I won the roast session. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
attributes.title: HE HAS NO LIPS🤬
